thread.title: Axel Springer buys 88 pct of Business Insider
thread.title_full: Axel Springer buys 88 pct of Business Insider

title: Axel Springer buys 88 pct of Business Insider
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Sep 29, 2015, 12:25 BST - UK Markets close in 4 hrs 5 mins Axel Springer buys 88 pct of Business Insider Reuters - UK Focus – 3 minutes 33 seconds ago 15.11 -0.18 
FRANKFURT, Sept 29 (Reuters) - German publisher Axel Springer said on Tuesday it would buy 88 percent of news website Business Insider valued at $343 million. 
Springer, which earlier this year missed out on buying the Financial Times newspaper from Pearson (Xetra: 858266 - news ) , said it already owns about 9 percent of the website, which has 76 million monthly visitors. 
Amazon Inc -founder and chief executive Jeff Bezos will hold the rest of the shares via his personal investment company Bezos Expeditions, Springer said in a statement. (Reporting by Harro ten Wolde; Editing by Maria Sheahan) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
